author: Justine Coleman
title: South Carolina issues 'home or work' order
description: South Carolina Gov. Henry McMaster (R) issued a "home or work" order Monday after increasing pressure from public health officials over the coronavirus pandemic.The order requires residents to st...
content:
South Carolina Gov. Henry McMaster (R) issued a home or work order Monday after increasing pressure from public health officials over the coronavirus pandemic.
The order requires residents to stay at home or work unless visiting family, exercising or getting… [+1609 chars]
